攲攲攲

攲字的基本解释

攲
qī
倾斜：“攲帆侧柁入波涛。”

攲
yǐ
古通“倚”，斜靠着：“攲枕听鸣蛙。”

攲
jī
持箸取物。

攲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》去奇切，平支，溪。］
［《廣韻》居綺切，上紙，見。］
(1)倾斜。
(2)依；倚。

攲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【支字部】　攲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页467第21
【唐韻】去奇切【集韻】丘奇切，?音崎。【說文】持去也。　又【家語】孔子觀於周廟，有攲器焉。使子路取水試之，滿則覆，中則正，虛則攲。【荀子·宥坐篇註】攲器，傾敧易覆之器。　又【廣韻】居綺切【集韻】舉綺切，?音掎。義同。【類篇】一曰不平。◎按攲字與攴部敧字不同。

攲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
攲字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
qī
Tilting: "The sail is leaning into the waves."
Squeeze
yǐ
Gu Tong "leaned" and leaned back: "Push the pillow and listen to the croaking frog."
Squeeze
jī
Holding chopsticks to fetch things.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" goes to Qiqie, Pingzhi, and Xi. ]
["Guangyun" Ju Qiqie, put on paper, see you. ]
(1) Tilt.
(2) According to; rely on.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Branches] 　攲; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 467-21
【Tang Yun】Go to Qiqie【Jiyun】Churchqiche, Otosaki. [Said the text] Keep going.　[Family Language] Confucius watched at the Zhou Temple, and he had a magic weapon. Make Zilu take the water and try it out. [Xunzi·Youzai Chapter Note] Retractor, a device that is easy to cover.　 [Guang Yun] Ju Qiqie [Jiyun] Ju Qiqie,? Sounds. The same meaning. 【Classes】One said unevenness. ◎The word press is different from the word 攴bu.
Squeeze

Name meaning
Nothing.

стар. * наклоняться, крениться
